attributes.action: recruit George Galloway to face Nick Griffin on Question time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We who sign this petition would like to see George Galloway face Nick Griffin in his upcoming apperance on question time. We understand that five guests can appear on the show and that it would be imperative to the equality and representation of the debate to have someone of his political stance to juxtapose that of Nick Griffin.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
